name: hoarfrost hat
notes:
the **hoarfrost hat** is worked in the round from the bottom to the top.
**size** 56-58 
**yarn:** zegna baruffa cashwool (1500 m/100 g; merino 100% with 4 strands of yarn held together) 55-65 g and igea astro 50 (1000 m/100 g; mohair 50%, polyamide 50%) 20-25 g.
**needles:** circular needles 3.0 and 3.5 mm. adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge.
notions: marker; cable needle, tapestry needle.
**gauge:** 26 sts and 35 rows over 10 cm in stockinette stitch worked in the round with 3.5 mm needles after wet blocking. 
**charts:** charts show all rows/rounds. read charts from bottom to top and work rounds from right to left.
